title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
**TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - 2-in-1 Cat Condo and Sisal Scratching Post**

**Product Description:**

Give your feline friend the ultimate haven with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree. This 2-in-1 cat condo and sisal scratching post is designed to provide a comfortable resting space and plenty of opportunities for play and exercise.

**Product Features:**

- High-quality 600g skin-friendly plush material and soft carpet base for maximum comfort and stability
- Safe and stable base to avoid tipping and wobbling, ensuring a secure play area for your cat
- Leaves design allows for home plant integration, adding a touch of greenery to your home
- 2-in-1 cat condo and sisal scratching post provides a large enough space for kittens or one medium cat to rest and play
- Includes a hang ball for added entertainment and stimulation
- Easy to assemble in three simple steps within 1 to 8 minutes, with tools included
- Available in three stylish colors: Grey, Beige, and Green

**Product Specifications:**

- Dimensions: 11 inches x 15 inches x 41 inches
- Weight: 6 Pounds
- Package contents: 1 x Cat Tree, 1 x Assembly Instruction, 1 x Set of Tools

**Important Notes:**

- Please check the size before buying to ensure it fits in your desired space
- For added stability, place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall
- Do not allow children to play with the cat tree

**Customer Service:**

At TSCOMON, we are committed to providing quality products and attentive service. Your satisfaction is our greatest pursuit. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.

**Order now and give your cat the ultimate haven!**
